channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear

item.title: CVE-2016-10443|2024-08-06T03:21:51.707Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, packet replay may be possible.

item.title: CVE-2016-10469|2024-08-06T03:21:52.130Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, incorrect implementation of RSA padding functions in CORE.

item.title: CVE-2016-10444|2024-08-06T03:21:51.633Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, SMMU Access Control Policy was updated to block HLOS from accessing BLSP and BAM resources.

item.title: CVE-2016-10474|2024-08-06T03:21:52.128Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, if the buffer length passed to the RIL interface is too large, the buffer size calculation may overflow, resulting in an undersize allocation for the buffer, and subsequently buffer overwrite.

item.title: CVE-2016-10484|2024-08-06T03:21:52.082Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, and SDX20, if a RPMB listener is registered with a very small buffer size, the calculation of the maximum transfer size for read and write operations may underflow, resulting in buffer overflow.

item.title: CVE-2016-10494|2024-08-06T03:21:52.136Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, integer overflow may lead to buffer overflows in IPC router Root-PD driver.

item.title: CVE-2016-10417|2024-08-06T03:21:51.444Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear IPQ4019, MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SDX20, in QTEE, a TOCTOU vulnerability exists due to improper access control.

item.title: CVE-2016-10433|2024-08-06T03:21:51.516Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 820, and SD 820A, TOCTOU vulnerability during SSD image decryption may cause memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2016-10425|2024-08-06T03:21:51.692Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, if GPT listener response is passed a large buffer offset, a buffer overflow occurs.

item.title: CVE-2016-10446|2024-08-06T03:21:51.455Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, incorrect configuration of the OCIMEM MPU may provide NonSecure Software access to OCIMEM memory used by TZ.

item.title: CVE-2016-10487|2024-08-06T03:21:52.132Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, in a QuRT API function, an untrusted pointer dereference can occur.

item.title: CVE-2016-10424|2024-08-06T03:21:51.636Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, upgrading LibPNG from 1.6.12 to 1.6.21 fixes multiple issues with different CWEs.

item.title: CVE-2016-10493|2024-08-06T03:21:52.144Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MDM9650, MDM9655, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, SD 850, and SDX20, NPA routines on the rootPD that handle resource requests remoted over QDI may not validate pointers passed from user space which may result in guest OS memory corruption.

item.title: CVE-2016-10418|2024-08-06T03:21:51.589Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 820A, and SD 835, HLOS can enable PMIC debug through TCSR_QPDI_DISABLE_CFG due to improper access control.

item.title: CVE-2016-10431|2024-08-06T03:21:51.354Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9650, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, TZ applications are not properly validated.

item.title: CVE-2016-10435|2024-08-06T03:21:51.713Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20automobile%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile%2C%20snapdragon%20wear
item.description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9625, MDM9635M, MDM9640, MDM9645, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 820, and SD 820A, in some QTEE syscall handlers, a TOCTOU vulnerability exists.
